title.rendered: Guest talk by Dominic Johnson CBE

content.rendered: Dominic Johnson CBE, gave a talk on “How to lead a successful career” to our HND students at Regent College London on 17th July. The main topic of discussion was asset management and the type of mind set one had to possess in order to open up their own #business and be successful. He also spent time interacting with our staff and students on a one to one basis.
